text: So, what is to go in French?
Aller
What is you go or you are going or you do go?
Vous allez
We are going
Nous allons
I am going
Je vais
He is going
Il va
She is going
Elle va
One is going
On va
Finally, they are going
Ils vont
And they, an entirely female group, are going
Elles vont
Using go, just in the same way as we do in English, is a very easy way to talk about the future in French.
So, for instance, how would you say in French, I'm going to do it later?
Je vais le faire plus tard
He is going to do it later
Il va le faire plus tard
What is to give in French?
Donner
And to give it to me?
Me le donner
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to her later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
So again, we have L is for last
But if there are two L's, Louis is last
How about
He's not going to give it to her later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
What is to them in French?
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
How would you say
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
How would you say
You, informal, are going to give it to me later
You, informal, are going to give it to me later
You, informal, are going to give it to me later
He's going to give it to me later
Use a rising intonation and say
You're going to give it to me?
You, informal, are going to give it to me later
Again, what is they are going to?
How would you say
They are going to wait?
They're going to wait for me
They're going to wait for me
They're going to wait for me
Thank you.
